tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for my knee Acl reconstruction. I consulted dr.ravitheja . He explained in detail regarding my problem..I got done my knee  ligment reconstruction ..it was done successfully.....I am very satisfied with the service done by the entire team ...staff, Nurse and doctor..thank you ...

I had recurrent low back ache and it was when the pain started radiating to my leg that I met Dr Ravi as suggested by my cousin who got his ACL surgery by him.. his approach to reach the diagnosis impressed me and I had faith that the doctor could cure my disease..he did clinical tests and said that I probably had a disc bulge that was compressing my main nerve travelling to the leg. He started on a few medicines and gave me simple excercise chart that I followed strictly which gave me the results.. I would recommend Dr Ravi highly for all orthopedic diseases..

Hi Everyone…my mother needed knee replacement surgery for that I visited Dr Raviteja. And he has done marvellous work for mother, her knee pain has gone surgery went absolutely phenomenal, I would strongly recommend Dr Raviteja sir for any joint replacement related issues. 
Thanks 
Deepankar Mishra 
Patient name - Kamla Mishra

Took my uncle for a hip fracture, Dr Raviteja attended him. From the beginning he was very clear in explaining us the problem, what should be done (surgery), what to expect post operatively, likely recovery timeline, expected complications during and after surgery ( even though terrifying, his assurance of dealing them made us to go through). Overall the surgery went well, and my uncle is walking painless after 3 months as explained by Dr Raviteja. Thank you doctor

Higher wait time.
No proper explanation.
He don’t listen to the patient, directly refers for xray and immediately to scanning. *** ** **** **** *******

my grand mother was 80 years and suffering from knee pain and went for knee replacement at dr jampani raviteja, and with in three days i m suprised to see she was walking and happly discharge from hospital , dr jampani ravateja sir you are best knee replacement surgeon in hyderabad

I consulted Dr. Ravi for my back pain after my mother insisted as she had gotten her Total knee replacement done by him. He patiently listened to what I had to say, and after couple of investigations he told me what can be done to reduce the pain and manage it. Fully satisfied with his care. Surely going to recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good doctor explained us about our problem.good hospital and ambience good nursing care. We prefer this hospital in Kukatpally . Waiting time is less. Rooms are good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good surgeon operated for acl. Walking now after 2 days. 
Good hospital. No pain. Good nursing care. Good anesthesi care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: back pain surgery went well. Hospital is very clean . Coffe day for attenders. MRI and ct in hospital. Anesthesia doctor supported well. Cost is reasonable.
